lines.text: Maybe... he's not a person? Maybe he's a demon that got summoned from that ash pile somehow?
Like an ash demon? In disguise? I don't know.
Whydah, please tell me you can at least figure out whether the body is human.
You THINK so?! You're not sure?!
...Okay, I hate to put a stop to the funniest thing I've ever seen you do, but I was just making stuff up.
Far as I know, there's no ash-summoning ritual.
